name: ColorRogue
description:
ColorRogue is game about an adventurer that wants to defeat evil ruler that took all of color from this world. Yu have to use 3 types of mana Red, Yellow, Blue. I didnt finish everything I wanted in this game but it has every main mechanic that I wanted in it so it is succes for me.

Controls

left, right arrow - chage option

Space - choose option

X - skip

Used programs: Aseprite, Unity

Pallete - https://lospec.com/palette-list/1bit-monitor-glow
